Class PlanetarySystem

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
java.util.AbstractList<E>
java.util.ArrayList<AstronomicalBody>
PlanetarySystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<AstronomicalBody>, java.util.Collection<AstronomicalBody>, java.util.List<AstronomicalBody>, java.util.RandomAccess
public class PlanetarySystem
extends java.util.ArrayList<AstronomicalBody>
A Planetary System, with an ArrayList of Astronomical Bodies.
